name: @prepair/basic-loader
description: David Walsh's super simple loader for loading image, CSS, and JavaScript files.

scripts.build: shx rm -rf lib && babel src --ignore spec.js -d lib && babel -o lib/basic-loader-amd.js --plugins transform-es2015-modules-amd src/basic-loader.js
scripts.publish-test: shx rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && shx cp -r e2e/* docs/ && shx mv docs/test.html docs/index.html
scripts.release: npm run build && git status --porcelain && git checkout master && git pull origin master && standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --access=public

author: Szabolcs Kurdi <szabolcs.kurdi@gmail.com> (https://github.com/szkrd)
